name: Butterfly Life
description:
Play as a butterfly in its different life cycles and survive as much as you can.

Life cycles

  • Cycle 1 - Egg: no control
  • Cycle 2 - Caterpillar: you can walk (a/d) and jump in branches (w/space), special power is run (mouse button 1 or j)
  • Cycle 3 - Chrysalis: no control, special power is heal (heals 50% of hp) (mouse button 1 or j)
  • Cycle 4 - Butterfly: you can fly (w/a/s/d), special power is area stun that removes enrage (mouse button 1 or j)

Enemies

  • Enemies enrage if you stay next to them and when you change cycles
  • Normal enemies will follow you and will go back if they lose your sight
  • Enraged enemies will always follow you

You can collect

  • Energy (to use special powers)
  • Health (restores health points)

Artwork Credits

  • Background from Platformer Fantasy Set 1 - szadiart
  • Eagle from Sunny Land - Ansimuz
  • Tree from Tree Pack - jestan

This game was made by johnperes for the Weekly Game Jam 155 with the theme "Cycle".
